1.text: Tie up your hair in a high ponytail and brush it.

2.text: Apply heat protectant to your ponytail to avoid damaging your hair.
2.vid: /4/41/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 2 Version 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Choose a heat setting that's right for you hair thickness.

4.text: Divide your ponytail in half, then gather a 1 in (2.5 cm) piece of hair.
4.vid: /a/a8/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 4 Version 2.360p.mp4

5.text: Wrap the piece of hair around the barrel of the curling wand.
5.vid: /9/99/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 5 Version 2.360p.mp4

6.text: Hold the curling wand in place for 10-20 seconds, then release the hair.
6.vid: /f/fb/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 6 Version 2.360p.mp4

7.text: Hold the hair into a tight curl for 5 seconds.
7.vid: /3/33/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 7 Version 2.360p.mp4

8.text: Repeat until you’ve completed one half of your ponytail.
8.vid: /d/d7/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 8 Version 2.360p.mp4

9.text: Switch to the other half of your ponytail and continue curling.
9.vid: /2/27/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 9 Version 2.360p.mp4

10.text: Allow your curls to cool, then take out the elastic band.

11.text: Split your hair into two sections and clip up the right side.
11.vid: /b/bf/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 11 Version 2.360p.mp4

12.text: Divide the left section of your hair in half again and clip the top piece.
12.vid: /c/cd/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 12.360p.mp4

13.text: Gather a 2-inch (5.1-cm) piece of hair from the back of your head.

14.text: Put the piece of hair in the straightener and twist away from your face.
14.vid: /a/ac/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 14 Version 2.360p.mp4

15.text: Allow the straightener to glide slowly down the entire length of your hair.
15.vid: /6/6c/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 15 Version 2.360p.mp4

16.text: Repeat the curling process until you’ve curled the entire bottom section.
16.vid: /2/25/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 16 Version 2.360p.mp4

17.text: Start from the back and curl 2 in (5.1 cm) sections of hair.
17.vid: /5/5e/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 17 Version 2.360p.mp4

18.text: Repeat this process with the right section of your hair.
18.vid: /e/ea/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 18 Version 2.360p.mp4

19.text: Finger comb through your hair for a more relaxed look.
19.vid: /6/6f/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 19 Version 2.360p.mp4

20.text: Wash your hair and wait until it’s almost dry, then brush it.

21.text: Rub a few drops of argan oil through your hair to add softness.
21.vid: /4/44/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 21 Version 2.360p.mp4

22.text: Pull your hair into a high ponytail and secure with an elastic band.
22.vid: /6/66/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 22 Version 2.360p.mp4

23.text: Cut the toe off a sock and roll it up to make a sock bun.
23.vid: /c/c8/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 23 Version 2.360p.mp4

24.text: Put the sock bun around your ponytail, then split your ponytail in half.
24.vid: /6/6b/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 24 Version 2.360p.mp4

25.text: Wrap one half of your ponytail repeatedly around the sock bun.
25.vid: /9/97/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 25 Version 2.360p.mp4

26.text: Combine the end sections and continue wrapping.
26.vid: /b/b6/Curl the Ends of Your Hair Step 26.360p.mp4

27.text: Sleep on your bun, then pull out the sock bun and hair elastic.
